name: Two More Minutes
description:
You had some rough sleep last night, and you need just two more minutes of shuteye, but you have to get up for school right now! Get ready to snooze some alarm clocks and break (surprisingly) dangerous bells to save your beauty rest!  This unique and very fun platformer was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51.

Two More Minutes has two colorful floors of levels, each with it's own tileset and background, containing in total 12 different levels, featuring three special alarming enemies, all with their own attacks and behavior. The game is 'clock-full' of cool character designs, creative animations, and music that is guaranteed to wind up in your head! 

Will you collect all two minutes worth of time, or will you get ticked off and fail to catch all your Z's?

Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrow Keys

Next Level - Up arrow key

Jump - Space

Restart - R
